This singlecenter , randomize , prospective study . 200 adult patient undergoing ophthalmic ambulatory surgery enrol study , patient randomly equally divide two group : Group TIVA ( TIVA propofol ) Group Des ( desflurane ) .Group TIVA maintain propofol 50~150μg/kg/min , remifentanil 0.1~0.5μg/kg/min , group Des maintain desflurane range 0.5~1.5 MAC . Both group patient ' bispectral index ( BIS ) value maintain 40~60 intraoperatively . The primary outcome awake time , secondary outcome include stay time postoperative care unit , discharge time , incidence postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) , incidence postoperative agitation , quality recovery 1 day postoperatively , well anesthesia cost , etc .
